warscrolls.name: Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Mutilating Blades
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Soulgorgers
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly non‑**UNIQUE HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WAR MACHINES** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn. This ability also affects **Companion** weapons.

warscrolls.name: Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Slavering For Sensation
abilities.declare: Pick up to 2 friendly **Hellflayer** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of this unit and each target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Threshing Doom
abilities.effect: When this unit moves, it can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units and can pass through the combat ranges of enemy **INFANTRY** units, but it cannot end a move in combat unless specified in the ability used.

abilities.name: Soulscent
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units that this unit passed across this phase to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If any models are slain by this ability, this unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Mutilating Blades
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Thrillseeking Cavalcade
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **Seeker Chariot** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit and the targets for the rest of the turn. In addition, for the rest of the turn, when this unit and the targets use the ‘Mutilating Blades’ ability, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted (if any).

warscrolls.name: Blissbarb Archers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Blissbrew Homonculus
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Blissbrew Homonculus** is a token. There is 1 **Blissbrew Homonculus** for every 10 models in this unit.

Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit while it has a **Blissbrew Homonculus**. If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove the **Blissbrew Homonculus** from the battlefield after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

warscrolls.name: Blissbarb Seekers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Glory Shots
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s ranged weapons for attacks that target units contesting an objective you do not control.

warscrolls.name: Contorted Epitome
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (4+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Horrible Fascination
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a command or RETREAT ability for a unit in combat with this unit
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Swallow Energy
abilities.effect: If you make a successful ward roll for this unit, add 1 to this unit’s power level until the end of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Daemonettes
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Lithe and Swift
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Piercing Claws** for the rest of the turn if this unit charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Dexcessa, the Talon of Slaanesh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Scion of Slaanesh
abilities.effect: While a friendly **Synessa** is on the battlefield, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Fleeting Dance of Death
abilities.effect: This unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by **RETREAT** abilities.

abilities.name: Redolence of Violence
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick up to D3 other friendly non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH DAEMON** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Joyous Battle Fury
abilities.effect:
If any enemy models were slain by this unit’s combat attacks this turn, **Heal (D3)** this unit, then place a **battle fury token** next to it.

Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Impaling Talons** for each **battle fury token** it has until the end of the next turn.

warscrolls.name: Dreadful Visage
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh

abilities.name: Flensing Tongues
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 6 dice. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If any models are slain by this ability, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Exalted Chariot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Excess of Blades
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified charge roll for that **CHARGE** ability. For each roll that exceeds the target’s Save characteristic, the target suffers 1 mortal damage.

warscrolls.name: Fane of Slaanesh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh

abilities.name: Damned Conduit
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** unit wholly within 12" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Allocate D3 damage points to the target (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). Then, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:

• Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks.
• Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for the target.
• Add 1 to casting rolls and unbinding rolls for the target.

warscrolls.name: Fiends
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Champion, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Soporific Musk
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Disruptive Song
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from casting rolls and unbinding rolls for enemy **WIZARDS** while they are within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Glutos Orscollion, Lord of Gluttony
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, War Machine, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Greatblade and Claws** is 6.

abilities.name: Gorge on Excess
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SYBARITE** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: **Heal (6)** the target.

abilities.name: Crippling Famishment
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• Halve the target’s Move characteristic.
• Halve run rolls and charge rolls for the target.

abilities.name: The Grand Gourmand
abilities.effect:
A different effect applies to friendly **SYBARITE** units each battle round while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, as shown below. The effects of all previous battle rounds also apply to those units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

**Battle Round 1:**
***Starter:*** Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for those units.

**Battle Round 2:**
***Main:*** Add 3 to those units’ control scores.

**Battle Round 3:**
***Dessert:*** Add 1 to hit rolls for those unit’s attacks.

**Battle Round 4+:**
***Digestif:*** Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of those units’ melee weapons.

warscrolls.name: Hellflayer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Threshing Doom
abilities.effect: When this unit moves, it can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units and can pass through the combat ranges of enemy **INFANTRY** units, but it cannot end a move in combat unless specified in the ability used.

abilities.name: Soulscent
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units that this unit passed across this phase to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If any models are slain by this ability, this unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Hellstriders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Maiming Charge
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy **INFANTRY** units while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Discordant Disruption
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability for a WIZARD within 18" of this unit
abilities.effect: The casting roll for that spell must be re-rolled. If 2 or more dice in the re-rolled casting roll have the same value or if 1 of the dice is a 6, inflict D3 mortal damage on that **WIZARD** after the effect of that spell has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Keeper of Secrets
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Elegant Greatblade** is 4.

abilities.name: Supernatural Grace
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Cacophonic Choir
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 visible enemy units within 6" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. If the roll exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

abilities.name: Dark Temptations
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

• Add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.
• Add 1 to save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.
• If the target is damaged, **Heal (D3)** the target.

Then, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Elegant Greatblade** for attacks that target that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Locus of Slaanesh
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH DAEMON** unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Hubris
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Only The Best Will Suffice
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Myrmidesh Painbringers** or **Symbaresh Twinsouls** unit that is in combat and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, each time a model in the target unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: 'You First, I Insist...'
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Your opponent must decide whether the target will accept or decline this unit’s challenge.

***Accept:*** The target has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn. If this unit is in combat with the target when the target is picked to use a **FIGHT** ability, all of the target’s attacks must target this unit.

***Decline:*** The target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Lord of Pain
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Share The Pain
abilities.effect: Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit for a damage point inflicted by a combat attack, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Disciples In Torment
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SYBARITE** units wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Mesmerising Mirror
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh

abilities.name: Gaze Not Into Its Depths
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Irresistible Lure
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a MOVE ability for a unit wholly within 12" of this MANIFESTATION
abilities.effect: If that enemy unit does not end the move closer to this **MANIFESTATION** than it was at the start of the move, inflict D3 mortal damage on it after the **MOVE** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Myrmidesh Painbringers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Paragons of Battle
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while it is contesting an objective you do not control.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Slaangor Fiendbloods
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Bestial Onslaught
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **waiting in ambush**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit on the battlefield wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Instinctive Advance
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 12" of this unit
abilities.effect: This unit can move up to 3" immediately after that command has been resolved, unless that command is a reaction, in which case this unit can move after the ability that it was reacting to has been resolved. That move can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units, and can end in combat.

abilities.name: Veiled Threat
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **waiting in ambush**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Syll'Esske, the Vengeful Allegiance
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon, Sybarite

abilities.name: Champions of the Gilded Throne
abilities.effect: When players are alternating picking units to use a **FIGHT** ability, when it is your turn to pick a unit, instead of picking 1 unit, you can pick a friendly non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH DAEMON** unit wholly within 18" of this unit and a friendly non-**HERO SYBARITE** unit wholly within 18" of this unit. Resolve the second **FIGHT** ability immediately after the first.

abilities.name: Wandering Minds
abilities.declare: Pick up to 1 visible friendly non-**HERO SYBARITE INFANTRY** unit and up to 1 visible friendly non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH DAEMON INFANTRY** unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If you picked a **SYBARITE** target, subtract 1 from ward rolls for damage points inflicted by its combat attacks until the start of your next turn. If you picked a **DAEMON** target, it has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Violent Offerings
abilities.effect: If any damage points were allocated to an enemy **WIZARD** or **PRIEST** by this unit’s combat attacks this turn and that enemy unit has been destroyed, add 1 to this unit’s power level for the rest of the battle. This unit can be affected by this ability multiple times and the effects are cumulative.

warscrolls.name: Seeker Chariot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Mutilating Blades
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Seekers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Quicksilver Speed
abilities.effect: When making run rolls for this unit, if you roll a 1-3, you can use a value of 4 instead.

warscrolls.name: Shalaxi Helbane
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Soulpiercer** is 4.

abilities.name: Supernatural Grace
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Paramount Hunter
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: Opponent declared a CHARGE ability for a HERO within 9" of this unit
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, it can immediately move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units but it must end that move within ½" of that **HERO**. If it does so, this unit has charged, and that **HERO**’s **CHARGE** ability has no effect.

abilities.name: Excess of Violence
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this turn. After the first is used, however, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Refine Senses
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s attacks that target enemy **HEROES**.
• Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made by enemy **HEROES** that target this unit.

warscrolls.name: Shardspeaker of Slaanesh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Mist Lurkers
abilities.effect: If this unit successfully casts a spell, until the start of your next turn, it can attack with its **Shadow-cloaked Claws**.

abilities.name: Twisted Mirror
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 8" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, subtract 1 from save rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Sigvald, Prince of Slaanesh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (4+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Powered By Vainglory
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn and the unmodified charge roll was 6+, the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Shardslash** is equal to the unmodified charge roll.

abilities.name: The Glorious Reborn
abilities.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Shardslash
abilities.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by this unit’s combat attacks.

warscrolls.name: Slaangor Fiendbloods
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Slaughter At Any Cost
abilities.effect: If any damage points were allocated to this unit this turn, this unit can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

warscrolls.name: Slickblade Seekers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Unrivalled Velocity
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: Syll'Esske, the Vengeful Allegiance
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon, Sybarite

abilities.name: Deadly Symbiosis
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO SYBARITE** unit and a friendly non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH DAEMON** unit to be the targets. Both units must be wholly within 12" of this unit.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, if either target uses the ‘All-out Attack’ or ‘All-out Defence’ command, the other target can also use the same command in the same phase and no command points are spent to use the command a second time.

abilities.name: The Vengeful Allegiance
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Subvert
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Symbaresh Twinsouls
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Fiendish Reflexes
abilities.effect: If this unit did not charge this turn, it has **WARD (5+)** while it is in combat.

abilities.name: Ego-driven Excess
abilities.effect: If this unit did not charge this turn, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Synessa, the Voice of Slaanesh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Voice of Slaanesh
abilities.declare: Pick a visible unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: If the target is a friendly unit, add 5 to the target’s control score for the rest of the turn. If the target is an enemy unit, subtract 5 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Enthralling Splendour
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Whispers of Doubt
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **HERO** within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for combat attacks that target that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Progeny of Slaanesh
abilities.effect: While a friendly **Dexcessa** is on the battlefield, add 1 to this unit’s power level.

warscrolls.name: The Dread Pageant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Sybarite

abilities.name: Slicing Fervour
abilities.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** while it is in combat with a **blissmarked** unit.

abilities.name: Blissbarb Shafts
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit’s **Hadzu** is on the battlefield, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 4+:
• Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
• The target is **blissmarked** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: The Masque
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (4+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: The Endless Dance
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 3" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Staff of Masks
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

• Add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Razor-edged Claws** for the rest of the turn.
• **Heal (3)** this unit.

warscrolls.name: The Thricefold Discord
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Indulgence Given Form
abilities.effect: Each time an enemy unit uses a command while it is within 12" of this unit, give 1 **indulgence point** to this unit, to a maximum of 6.

abilities.name: Sublime Harmonies
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Vashtiss** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**. In addition, each time you make a casting roll for this unit, you can spend any number of **indulgence points** it has. For each point spent, add 1 to the casting roll.

warscrolls.name: Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh, Daemon

abilities.name: Lithe and Swift
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Ravaging Claws** for the rest of the turn if this unit charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Lust For Violence
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Daemonettes** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Wheels of Excruciation
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Hedonites of Slaanesh

abilities.name: Exquisite Agony
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units that this **MANIFESTATION** passed across this turn to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll 6 dice for each target. For each roll that is less than the target’s Save characteristic, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

rules.name: The Ecstatic Throngs
rules.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for friendly **SYBARITE INFANTRY** units while they are damaged or if they had any models slain in the same turn.

rules.name: Ecstatic Revellers
rules.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **SYBARITE INFANTRY** units while they are wholly outside friendly territory.

rules.name: Exquisite Palate
rules.effect: Each time a friendly non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH DAEMON** uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

rules.name: Godly Ambitions
rules.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly non‑**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** units while they are within the combat ranges of any friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH HEROES.**

rules.name: Reckless Haste
rules.effect: Friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH CAVALRY** units can use a **RETREAT** ability and still use **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH CAVALRY** units by **RETREAT** abilities.

rules.name: Prodigy of Excess
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH HERO** that has an artefact of power to be the target.
rules.effect:
Give the target a heroic trait from the ‘Figureheads of the Dark Prince’ or ‘Hedonistic Obsessions’ tables.

**Designer’s Note**: *This heroic trait is given to the target during the deployment phase, not during army composition*.

spells.name: Phantasmagoria
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target is picked to use a **FIGHT** ability, you can pick a friendly unit in combat with the target. That friendly unit can move 2D3" after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved. It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat.

spells.name: Sadistic Spite
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **EUPHORIC** unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: The target’s melee weapons have **Crit (Mortal)** instead of **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the battle round.

spells.name: Overwhelming Acquiescence
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks that target that enemy unit until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Summon Mesmerising Mirror
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Mesmerising Mirror** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Mesmerising Mirror** wholly within 18" of the caster, visible to them and more than 3" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Wheels of Excruciation
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Wheels of Excruciation** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Wheels of Excruciation** endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Dreadful Visage
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Dreadful Visage** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Dreadful Visage** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Threnody Voicebox
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.effect: For the rest of the turn, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

artefacts.name: Pendant of Slaanesh
artefacts.effect: If any damage points were allocated to this unit this turn, **Heal (3)** this unit.

artefacts.name: Icon of Infinite Excess
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick a non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Celebrity Warlord
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO SYBARITE** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

heroicTraits.name: Master of Temptation
heroicTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if your opponent has any **temptation dice**. Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, while your opponent has not used any of their **temptation dice** to replace a roll for the target this turn, the target can only use **CORE** abilities.

heroicTraits.name: The Need For Perfection
heroicTraits.effect: The first time each turn that an unmodified charge roll, casting roll, unbinding roll or banishment roll for a friendly non-**EUPHORIC** unit wholly within 12" of this unit is 5 or less, that unit has the **EUPHORIC** keyword for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Strongest Alone
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s attacks while it is more than 6" from all other friendly units.

heroicTraits.name: Into the Fray
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit charged this turn and the unmodified charge roll was 8+, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Glory Hog
heroicTraits.effect: If an enemy **HERO** is destroyed by this unit, this unit has the **EUPHORIC** keyword for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: An Excess of Depravity
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** units to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
The targets have the **EUPHORIC** keyword for the rest of the battle round.

In addition, for each friendly unit you pick, give your opponent 1 **temptation dice**. During this battle round, instead of making a wound roll, save roll, ward roll or run roll, your opponent can use 1 temptation dice to replace the roll they would have made with a 6, or instead of making a charge roll they can use 2 temptation dice to replace 2 of the dice in a charge roll with two 6s (other dice could then be rolled normally). Rolls that have been replaced count as unmodified rolls and cannot be re-rolled. You cannot use temptation dice to replace a re-roll.

Each time your opponent uses a **temptation dice**, they must roll it. On a 1-2, your opponent’s roll is replaced by that value instead of a 6, and you must allocate D3 damage points to the unit for which the roll was replaced immediately aer the ability used by that unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

At the end of the battle round, any **temptation dice** that have not been used are lost.

battleTraits.name: Euphoric Killers
battleTraits.effect:
While a friendly unit has the **EUPHORIC** keyword:

• That unit’s weapons, including **Companion** weapons, have **Crit (2 Hits)**.
• That unit can use a **RUN** ability and still use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

**Designer’s Note**: *Note that ‘Sadistic Spite’ does not affect **Companion** weapons.*
